answerText: dopamine [prompt on DA][10]  This family of enzymes originally discovered by Mary Bernheim functions by breaking down dopamine, tryptamine, and other associated neurotransmitters. It catalyzes the conversion of metanephrine to VMA.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 2 | 12 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Identify this neurotransmitter which is heavily involved in the brain's reward pathways. It is a precursor to epinephrine
